networkDesc: SDSN Sahel is a community of universities, research centers, and other knowledge institutions to translate the latest expertise in sustainable development into action.
networkVision: Mobilizing SDG implementation through solution initiatives and long-term pathways in the Sahel Region.

networkObjectives.header: To mobilize scientific and technological expertise
Continuously identify opportunities for broadening the network

networkImpact: In its seven member countries, SDSN Sahel works to develop strong ties with academia and government to raise awareness of the SDGs, participate in the processes to determine national SDG policies, and promote solutions.

networkMetrics.desc: Member Institutions in the region - covering academia, NGOs and research institutions.
